EmailTemplate.subject: Test Drive Pivotal Cloud Foundry Platform on March 12 in Charlotte
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join <https://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/charlotte?utm_source=Pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-roadshow> the Pivotal Cloud Foundry team for a full day of in-depth, hands-on sessions where you will build and deploy software on a next generation cloud platform. Register now <https://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/charlotte?utm_source=Pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-roadshow> for our March 12 event!
Workshop at a glance:
Keynote: Software is Eating the World In a world where real-time information drives decision making in organizations that are not traditional technology companies.
Hands-On Session: The Developer Experience
You will learn how to push, bind and scale an application.
Hands-On Session: Architecture & Operations You will learn how the platform works, as well as the operational visibility it can provide to your entire ecosystem.
Hands-On Lab: Enabling Continuous Delivery Walk through how the platform can enable continuous delivery, including how you can leverage CloudBees Jenkins for continuous integration.
Sign up today <https://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/charlotte?utm_source=Pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-roadshow>!
